data.name: Charlotte for Boobs 'em up
data.detailed_description:
Charlotte is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Linz, Austria, but raised in Vienna, Charlotte is a Austrian native and a big fan of the opera.

Charlotte has always had an amicable nature and she was a popular girl in high school who got good grades. Charlotte loves traveling and traveled a lot by Europe. Charlotte also briefly worked at Disneyland, Paris, before she decided to try herself in adult industry.

It all began in 2015 when Charlotte visited a friend of hers to make her first porn shoot. Charlotte enjoyed the experience so much, that she ended up filming her first ever girl/girl scene in porno film. She was a porno actress for about two years.

Now Charlotte finished her career as a porno actress, because she want to become a most highly paid prostitute in Vienna.

Help Charlotte to take her place on the street!

data.short_description: Charlotte is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
